access_key.description: The AWS API keys. Both access_key and secret_key must be supplied or both must be blank. If blank the environment variables `AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID` and `AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY` are used.

access_key_selector.description: secret key selector to get the keys from a Kubernetes Secret

profile.description: Named AWS profile used to authenticate

region.description: AWS region, if blank the region from the default credentials chain is used

role_arn.description: AWS Role ARN, an alternative to using AWS API keys

secret_key_selector.description: secret key selector to get the keys from a Kubernetes Secret
